summary: Location SCI (lease comparison) feature testing completed. All backend APIs working (100% pass rate). Frontend UI fully functional with all lease comparison features working correctly.

issues: Console error: 401 Unauthorized when loading inventory - /api/inventory returns 401

action_items: Minor: Fix /api/inventory 401 error shown in console (not related to Location SCI feature)
seed_data_creation: None required - using existing RAM 1500 Sport, Rebel vehicle data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Location SCI feature fully tested and working. The feature shows after selecting a vehicle and entering price, then clicking 'Location SCI' toggle. Km per year selection (12k, 18k, 24k) correctly adjusts residual percentage with +4% for 12k at 48 months. Lease comparison cards (Std + Lease Cash vs Taux Alternatif) display correctly with best choice banner. Payment frequency toggle (Mensuel, Aux 2 sem, Hebdo) updates lease payments.

backend_apis: GET /api/sci/residuals - returns vehicle residual data with km adjustments
GET /api/sci/lease-rates - returns lease rate programs with standard and alternative rates
POST /api/sci/calculate-lease - performs lease calculation with correct payments
frontend_ui: Location SCI toggle button appears after vehicle/price selection
Km per year selection (12k, 18k, 24k) - changes residual correctly
Std + Lease Cash card with correct values (8 250 $ lease cash, 8.29% rate)
Taux Alternatif card with correct values (3.99% rate)
Best choice banner identifies cheaper option (Std + Lease Cash = Meilleur choix)
Payment frequency toggle updates lease payment display
